author: schof
msg: maven reorg v2

author: tobrien
msg: This unit test was referencing some variables which are no longer
available.  For now, this unit test references the old
placeholder class in codec.binary, eventually, this test
should hit the class in base.

author: tobrien
msg: The existing Base64 public interface should be preserved even
in a major release.  People who are relying on the static
public interface shouldn't have to adapt to the 2.0 release if
we can help it.
This Base64 simply references the DEFAULT static instance
of the Base64 class.

author: tobrien
msg: Copying the Base64 class from codec.binary to the base subpackage
and making this class rely on instance variables.  This is
the first step to creating a version of Base64 that supports
alternate lookup alphabets as well as the ability to
customize encoding behavior to comply with the numerous
definitions of Base64.
